EnableFemaleFarmerPregnancy.Description: Changes certain dialogue to reflect the female farmer being pregnant when married to Robin.

UniqueWeddingDress.Description: Uses Shadowfire1223's custom wedding dress for Robin. Turn off to have the standard wedding dress sprite.

EnableRobinAltSprites.Description: Uses Shadowfire1223's alternate sprites for Robin, including an alternate wedding dress. No winter option available.

EnableRRomanceAdditionalDialogue.Description: Suggested to be turned on unless there's a mod conflict. Corrects, replaces, and adds to other characters dialogue and events to reflect Robin's new story as well as adding Veronica (if enabled) to the world.

DisableOnlyFamily.Description: Disables RRomance Additional Dialogue on family members of Robin. Highly suggested to not use unless there's a mod conflict.

DisableOnlyNonFamily.Description: Disables RRomance Additional Dialogue on non-family members of Robin. Highly suggested to not use unless there's a mod conflict.

EnableVeronica.Description: Adds Veronica to the game in place of Robin. If disabled, there will instead be two Robins, the original and the datable one. Veronica's sprites and portraits by Shadowfire1223. No winter options available.

EnableExpandedSupport.Description: Expanded will already work with this mod, but lore might not match up, especially in regards to Robin and Veronica. What this option does is make a few areas of Expanded conform to this mod (so Veronica will appear in place of Robin, Veronica's name will be used where it should be, etc.). If you experience errors with Expanded AND Robin or Veronica, disable this option.

14HeartFix.Description: Should fix issues with the 14 heart event occasionally crashing. If you still have issues with Robin's 14 heart event, turn this option off. The sound/music may sound off when cycling through options, whereas it'll play propery with this turned off. When turned off, the 14 heart event tends to crash if you cycle too fast or too much (usually on the third loop).

EnableRandomMeme.Description: Enables a single meme response you're unlikely to come across in the first place for Robin.

IncompleteSeasonalSupport.Description: Adds Robin's kissing sprite for seasonal outfit mods, but the kissing sprite uses her regular clothes. Flower Dance and Wedding Dress sprites should function without this option.

ParentNoun.Description: Only works with [CP] Gender Neutrality Mod. The uncapitalized noun to which your farmer will be referred to. Examples include: parent, mother, father, guardian, progenitor, etc.

SubjectivePronoun.Description: Only works with [CP] Gender Neutrality Mod. The subjective pronoun to use. Examples include: he, she, they, etc.

CapitalSubjectivePronoun.Description: Only works with [CP] Gender Neutrality Mod. The capitalized subjective pronoun to use. Examples include: He, She, They, etc. Special Note: The first letter should be capitalized.

SpouseNoun.Description: Only works with [CP] Gender Neutrality Mod. The noun which people will use to describe your marital status. Examples: husband, wife, spouse, partner, etc.

Entries.Introduction: Hi @!$1#$b#It can be exhausting to meet everyone in town, but it's worth it. There's a lot of great people here in the Valley!$0
Entries.Tue4: I'd be happy to help you learn some woodworking, but I'm busy at the moment.

Entries.Ram: Oh great, wet wood.$2#$b#Looks like a good day to curl up by the fire and stay inside instead.$1

Entries.Ram1: I never thought I could love again. But with you...#$b#I'll be the happiest wife in the world.$1

Entries.Rainy_Day_Ram: An early morning walk in the rain is nice. You should come with me one day. It's good for the soul.
Entries.Rainy_Night_Ram: I took the day off on account of rain. I stayed inside and played games all day.#$b#Which games? Oh just a small CYOA where you can conquer the world. I ended up curing all the children turned into doves while managing to negotiate a lasting peace between all of the countries.#$b#It was a very rare achievement. Took me a while to reach it.#$b#Sorry, I guess I rambled on a bit huh?$2
Entries.Indoor_Day_Ram: Your -- our -- farm is so nice. And this house is so cozy...#$b#You know what would be perfect? A swinging bench to put on the porch. Then we could sit together and watch the sunset...#$b#Yes, and hold hands, just like we're doing now. Fine, maybe a little more, but I'm trying to focus on a serious idea here!$9
Entries.Indoor_Night_Ram: Yawn... I'm ready for bed. Do you think you could hold me in your arms until I fall asleep?
Entries.Outdoor_Ram: It's a good day to work outside. Don't you agree?
Entries.spring_Ram: Spring always brings new ideas and opportunities. I wonder what will happen this year.
Entries.fall_Ram: I love the holidays and the colder weather. And you'll be done with farming soon, so we'll be able to spend more time together!
Entries.summer_Ram: Summer is the best time of year for work. It might be hot out but at least I don't have to deal with a lot of rain.
Entries.winter_Ram: Brr... I'm freezing, would you hold me close and warm me up?
Entries.spouseRoom_Ram: I'd love to get a lathe, but I can't put it in here...#$b#Hmm, maybe I should build a work shed so I don't have to always go up to the carpentry shop.

Entries.Town_49_24: It's so great that the community center has been fixed!#$b#I like to come out here and think of projects I could do to potentially improve the community center for everyone.
I can't believe they successfully took over the community center. How long do you think it will be before they put me out of business?$3#$b#Maybe it's time that I move.$2

Entries.Ram: Spring is a busy time of year... so it's nice to have a day off to catch up with friends.
Entries.Ram_spouse: Good luck with the egg hunt!$1#$e#I'll have a special surprise for you at home if you win.$7
Entries.Ram_y2: No offense, @. But Maru's going to win the egg festival this year. I believe in her.#$b#Even if it's as if the universe itself wants only Abigail to win.$8
Entries.Ram_spouse_y2: I've hidden in one of the eggs a note that entitles its owner to a free favor.#$b#Good luck out there. And search for that egg I hid. I'm sure you'll get more out of it than the other contestants.$1

Entries.Ram: I feel a little old to be participating in the flower dance. Perhaps I'll just sit it out.
Entries.Ram_spouse: I remember your first time at this festival.#$b#And how much I wanted you to come ask me to dance. But also how afraid I was to put myself back out there again.$6#$b#Thank you, for coming into my life.$7
Entries.Ram_y2: Sebastian and Maru were both so adorable when they each had their first dance.$1#$b#Time really flies.$0
Entries.Ram_spouse_y2: This wasn't my favorite festival in the past.#$b#But after meeting you, I've come to really enjoy it.$7#$b#Let's have a good time today, @.$1

Entries.Ram: *grumble* Oh, heh, that's my stomach. It smells so good, it's hard to wait for what you guys are cooking.$6
Entries.Ram_spouse: You know I've always wondered what Lewis might do if 'something' of his were put in the soup.
Entries.Ram_y2: Ever since you came to town, the soup has tasted so much better.#$b#You should be proud of what you produce on your farm, @.$h
Entries.Ram_spouse_y2: I'm looking forward to whatever mystery ingredient you're going to add.#$b#You always seem to find someway to make this luau special.

Entries.Ram: *yawn*... It's past my bed-time.$s#$e#Hey, did you see that candle-boat? I crafted it myself.$h
Entries.Ram_spouse: *yawn*... It's past my bed-time.$s#$e#Hey, did you see that candle-boat? I crafted it myself.$h#$e#If you wanted, though, we could go home and go to bed. I don't think...#$b#What was I saying? I think I nodded off for a moment there.$7
Entries.Ram_y2: Hmm? Oh, you're talking to me.#$b#Sorry, I'm not much of a night person, but I can't help myself. I love this festival!$1
Entries.Ram_spouse_y2: It's beautiful out here.#$b#I can't wait to watch the jellies light up the ocean with you.$6#${Keep me warm, alright?^I'll keep you warm, alright?^Let's keep each other warm, alright.}$

Entries.Ram: Woodworking is an ancient tradition that I'm very proud to be a part of.$h
Entries.Ram_spouse: We're going to win this time for sure. No one can compete with the quality of our products!
Entries.Ram_y2: When you stare at a clown, isn't the clown supposed to stare back?$2#$b#They haven't looked my way yet. It's freaking me out.$3
Entries.Ram_spouse_y2: Watching this clown is making me want to watch 'Klowns from Outer Space' again.#$b#It'll be a great way to celebrate winning this year!$1

Entries.Ram: Wow, Veronica's woodworking has really come along well! I taught her everything she knows, of course.$1
Entries.Ram_spouse: We're going to win this time for sure. No one can compete with the quality of our products!
Entries.Ram_y2: When you stare at a clown, isn't the clown supposed to stare back?$2#$b#They haven't looked my way yet. It's freaking me out.$3
Entries.Ram_spouse_y2: Watching this clown is making me want to watch 'Klowns from Outerspace' again.#$b#It'll be a great way to celebrate winning this year!$1

Entries.Ram: I hope some of my 'surprises' don't scare Maru too much.
Entries.Ram_spouse: Despite helping construct parts of the maze, I've always been too afraid to enter it. But...#$b#If you were with me, holding my hand, I think I could make it through. Promise to not let go, okay?$9
Entries.Ram_y2: Unfortunately, there isn't much point to me entering the maze, as I already know about all of the surprises.#$b#That's the problem when you're one of the people who helped design it.$8
Entries.Ram_spouse_y2: You know, I've been thinking that we should start to dress up for this each year.#$b#$I could dress up as a tree.#$b#${You could be Paul Bunyan.^You could be a dryad.^You could be a woodpecker.}$

Entries.Ram: After the divorce, I had decided to let her take over doing the Ice Sculpture.#$b#That didn't last long once I got a look at Leah's plans. I just had to join in!$1
Entries.Ram_spouse: I can't talk right now, @. Leah and I need to concentrate to get our sculpture finished.$3#$e#Hey, wait...#$b#I just want you to know I'll be cheering you on while you ice fish. Have a good time, honey!$7
Entries.Ram_y2: Working with ice has always been a bit of a challenge. Leah sometimes makes it look too easy.
Entries.Ram_spouse_y2: You should help us out someday with the ice sculpture, @. I wonder what we'd be able to create together.$6

Entries.Ram: Once Veronica moved to town, I had decided to let her take over doing the Ice Sculpture.#$b#That didn't last long once I got a look at Leah's plans. I just had to join in!$1
Entries.Ram_spouse: I can't talk right now, @. Leah and I need to concentrate to get our sculpture finished.$3#$e#Hey, wait...#$b#I just want you to know I'll be cheering you on while you ice fish. Have a good time, honey!$7
Entries.Ram_y2: Working with ice has always been a bit of a challenge. Leah sometimes makes it look too easy.
Entries.Ram_spouse_y2: You should help us out someday with the ice sculpture, @. I wonder what we'd be able to create together.$6

Entries.Ram: Brr... It's cold out here, I wish someone had some cocoa warm and ready.
Entries.Ram_spouse: ${I'm freezing!#$b#*glomp*#$b#Hold me, please, and warm me up.$9^You're freezing!#$b#*glomp*#$b#Stay in my arms, I'll keep you warm.$9}$
Entries.Ram_y2: This is one of my favorite times of year.#$b#I can actually get my whole family to sit at the same table and share a meal.
Entries.Ram_spouse_y2: I'm glad to have you as part of my family now.#$b#Let's have some hot cocoa when we get home and warm ourselves by the fire.$9

Entries.Ram: I always wanted to craft some fireworks myself.#$b#Everyone seems to believe I would blow my hand off with the stuff, however.$s#$e#It scares me when Maru had messed around with them before, but she's responsible enough that I can trust her to do what I can't.$h
Entries.Ram_spouse: I can't wait to watch the fireworks with you later, @.#$b#It's one of my favorite festivals to spend with you.$9

Entries.Ram: I don't know if I'm more excited that Maru finally let me see that invention she'd been working on, or to watch Sebastian play.#$e#Make sure that you don't miss the band, @.
Entries.Ram_spouse: I think it's good that Sebby has a hobby that gets him out of the basement sometimes.#$b#I'll see you later for the concert, @.$h

Entries.Ram: I can't believe another year has passed already.#$b#Happy New Year, @.$h
Entries.Ram_spouse: Do you have any resolutions this year?#$b#Mine is to spend a little more time with you.$9

Entries.ramHeart: @,^Meet me up in the mountains sometime between 18:00-23:00. It's a surprise!^ -Robin
Entries.ramGiftToLeah: Hi @!^ I hope you'll come by to visit soon, although Leah might not let you in if you haven't befriended her yet. I attached something that might help you with that!^ -Robin%item object 196 1 %%
Entries.summer_4_1: Maru's birthday is coming up and I need some quartz in order to finish building her gift. If you could, please get me a piece of quartz.^ -Robin%item quest 751 %%
Entries.ramHappy: Dear @,^ I'm so happy that you decided to move to your grandpa's farm. It's nice to have a friend like you, someone that I can be really close with. I sent this ~bo~~ tomato to congratulate you on having a successful farm!^ -Robin%item object 256 1 %%
Entries.winter_3_1: Hi @^ Sebby's birthday is coming up and you picked out such a great strawberry for Maru, I was hoping you could find a nice Frozen Tear for him during one of your mining escapades.^ -Robin%item quest 752 %%
Entries.ramThinking: Dear @,^ Ever since you gave me that bouquet, I haven't been able to get you out of my mind. It's so bad that I almost lost a finger to my saw yesterday. Anyways, just wanted you to know I'm thinking of you, perhaps a little too much. Hope that whatever you're doing, you might be thinking of me too.^ -Love, Robin
Entries.ramSpaghetti: Hi @,^ The kids were over the other day so I cooked up some spaghetti. I was in the mood for it again, so I thought I'd drop off a fresh dish of spaghetti for your enjoyment.^ -Robin%item object 224 1 %%

Entries.751: ItemDelivery/A gift for Maru/Robin would like a piece of quartz so she can finish building Maru's gift./Deliver a quartz to Robin./Ram (O)80/-1/250/-1/true/Thanks so much, @!$1#$b#Maru's gift is going to come out great with this!
Entries.752: ItemDelivery/A gift for Sebastian/Robin would like a shiny Frozen Tear to give to Sebastian/Deliver a Frozen Tear to Robin./Ram 84/-1/250/-1/true/Thanks @!$1#$b#I'm sure this will make Sebastian's day!

Entries.NPC.cs.4447: {0}, we're going to have a baby soon.$l
Entries.NPC.cs.4448: {0}, I'm so happy that you're pregnant with our child. I can't wait to meet them!$1#$b#I should get to work on their crib. You want to help?$1
Entries.NPC.cs.4449: Being a parent is annoying, sometimes...  I just don't feel like getting up. At least they're still too young to talk back like Sebby.$a

BeforeMovie.Text: This was the kind of movie Demetrius hated.

AfterMovie.Text: Thanks for the movie, @. It was nice to watch this type of movie without all of the criticism.$h

BeforeMovie.Text: I've been feeling kind of dull lately, so an action-packed movie is exactly what I need.

AfterMovie.Text: I'm all fired up, now! That was great.$h

BeforeMovie.Text: I'm not sure what this movie's about, but I don't really care! It's just good to get out of the house.

AfterMovie.Text: That was a lot of fun, @. I'm glad we did this.

BeforeMovie.Text: This movie makes me so emotional. Promise you won't judge me if I start crying.$7

Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Ram: You read my mind, I've been wanting to see that movie for awhile.$6#$b#It'll be romantic.$9
That sounds romantic. I'll ask Sebastian to babysit.$9#$b#Don't worry, he won't smoke while he babysits.$4

Entries.DesertFestival_Ram: Do you think Leah would appreciate a cactus? It would *spruce* up the place.$4#$b#Sorry, sorry. It's just some woodworking humor.$1
Entries.DesertFestival_Ram_marriage: This heat has me looking forward to summer.#$b#We should spend some time on the beach once the weather is nicer.
Entries.Shop_Ram: Hey, check out this custom wallpaper I made. Want it?

Entries.AcceptGift_(O)Book_Woodcutting: What's this... 'Woody's Secret'? ... Is there something you'd like to propose to me, @?$6#$b#Oh, it's about woodcutting! Hahaha... Is it wrong if I say I'm a little disappointed?$1

What's this... 'Woody's Secret'? ...#$b#${I guess I'll be finding out tonight, right?$6^So this must be what you received in the mail the other day. I look forward to finding out the secret tonight.$6^Hmm, sounds like you have something interesting in mind.$6}$#$b#Oh, it's about woodcutting! Hahaha... Is it wrong if I say I'm a little disappointed?$1
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)426:
Hear me out, okay. We can use this goat cheese instead of Parmesan on our spaghetti tonight.#$b#
				$q 13333/13334 gcheeseregrets#Does that face you're making mean you regret your gift?
				#$r 13333 10 no_regrets#Goat cheese spaghetti sounds great!
				#$r 13333 5 some_regrets#Of course not! I'm just a little hesitant is all.
				#$r 13334 -10 regrets_mean#Of course! That's so gross!
				#$r 13334 0 regrets_keep_peace#Uh... I'm happy that you're happy?
				#$r 13334 5 regrets_normal#You try it on your spaghetti. As for me, I think I'll stick with Parmesan.
Entries.gcheeseregrets: $p 13333 #Thank you, @!$h.#$b#We can make that spaghetti with it again. Unless you have any better ideas.|Thank you, @. Even if you nearly regretted it last time.#$b#I promise I won't make you eat something that sounds unappealing to you.
Entries.no_regrets: Oh, good.$7#It does sound delicious, doesn't it?$h
Entries.some_regrets: Haha, I won't force it down you.$h#But I'm sure if you try a bite you'll be convinced!$0
Entries.regrets_keep_peace: Haha, so that's a yes. Don't worry, I'll only use it on mine.$h
Entries.regrets_normal: Nice way of avoiding the question, @.$h#$b#Thank you, really. At least I'll get to enjoy it on my spaghetti tonight.

Entries.mountain_28_24: I love the mountains. The fresh air and the view can't be beat!$1#$b#I also get to see Maru and Sebastian when I come up here.$0#$b#I miss living with them, but I think the way things are is probably for the best.$2
Entries.Town_51_90: I found a leftover egg from the egg hunt.#$b#Don't worry, it's not rotten, it's a plastic one.#$e#Let's open it up and see what's inside. Oh, just a slip of paper. I wonder if Pierre hid it for Abigail to find?#$e#Well good night!$1#$e#Huh? What did it say? Entries.stardrop_gift: Honey... You've made me so happy, I wanted to give you something special to show how much I love you.#$b#Emily also said it'd give you some extra stamina, though it could be an old wives' tell.$6#$b#Care to see if it's true?$9
Entries.reject_two_heartA: Sorry, @. I don't think we know each other well enough for that.$2
Entries.reject_two_heartB: Sorry, @. I don't think that's a good idea.$2
Entries.reject_four_heartA: Sorry, @. I'm not ready to have another relationship yet.$2
Entries.reject_four_heartB: Sorry, @. I'm not sure if, or even when, I'll be ready for that type of relationship again.$2
Entries.engageA: You're already engaged.$3#$B#Invest your time in something productive instead.$0
Entries.engageB: You're already engaged.$3#$B#Now go have a serious talk with your betrothed and fix whatever issues you two are having.$0
Entries.marriedA: I'm not going to be your mistress.$3#$b#If you don't have any carpentry related business, then it's best if you leave.
Entries.marriedB: Do you think I'm desperate or something? It's not happening @.
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: Haha. Good joke.$1#$b#Wait, you're serious? We don't even know each other!$3
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: I'm not a believer in love at first sight, @. Best take your declarations elsewhere.$3
Entries.refusal_knownB: I can't. Please, don't...$3#$b#Please, let's leave it at that.$2
Entries.refusal_botherA: I don't care how many times you ask. The answer is still no.$3
Entries.refusal_botherB: Do you even listen to anything I say? I've already told you no.#$b#No amount of pleading will make a difference.$3
Entries.rejectNPCB: I don't have time for this.$3
Entries.birthdayLoveA: I can't wait to eat this! Thanks, @.$1
Entries.birthdayLikeA: Thanks, @. I can put this to good use.
Entries.birthdayDislikeA: Ugh, why? Is this some sick joke, @?$3
Entries.birthdayNeutralB: Hey, you remembered! Thanks for the gift, @.

Entries.give_flowersA: ...!!$9#$b#I'm excited for the wedding too, @. I can't wait to be your wife.$9
Entries.give_flowersB: These are lovely, @.$6#$b#I'll have to put these in some water. Although I'm not sure if I have any vases...#$b#But you do. Why don't I come by tonight, you know, to get a vase?$9
Entries.marriedA: I think one pendant's enough. But...#$b#I guess I'll accept it, but the one you originally gave me is the one I'll always cherish.$6
Entries.marriedB: I've heard the way to a woman's heart is through power tools, not expensive copies of pendants she already owns.$1
Entries.engageA: Did we break up?#$b#No?#$b# Then why are you proposing again?$3
Entries.engageB: I'm sorry. But it's a no.$3#$b#Did that scare you, dummy?#$b#Good. We're already engaged. Don't go forgetting that again.

Entries.birthdayLikeA: Thanks, @. I can put this to good use.
Entries.birthdayDislikeA: Ugh, why? Is this some sick joke, @?$3
Entries.birthdayDislikeB: Are you sure we should be getting married?$3#$b#Maybe you could try a little harder in the future.$0
Entries.birthdayNeutralB: Hey, you remembered! Thanks for the gift, @.

Entries.give_flowersA: This will make my room a lot brighter. Thanks, @!$6#$b#*hug*$6#$b#I'm so happy that you're still so romantic.$6
Entries.give_flowersB: You shouldn't have, @!$6#$b#No, really, you shouldn't have. You know how much flowers cost? You should, considering you grow them.$3#$b#They're worth it because you love me so much? Fine, you win, @.$0#$b#Really, thanks for the flowers. For the thought. And for all of the love you continue to shower me with. I love you too.$9
Entries.marriedB: I'm curious, @. How would you feel if I had some spare pendants lying around?$3
Entries.birthdayLoveA: You're the best husband. This is my favorite, @!$1^You're the best wife. This is my favorite, @!$1
Entries.birthdayLoveB: We can eat this together, if you want, @.$6#$b#I'm so happy to have a husband that knows me so well.$9^#I'm so happy to have a wife that knows me so well.$9
Entries.birthdayLikeA: Thanks, @.#$b#There's no one else that I'd rather spend my birthday with than you.$2
Entries.birthdayLikeB: Is it a power tool? It is, isn't it?$2#$b#Oh well.$4#$b#This is still a really great gift. Thank you, @.$2
Entries.birthdayDislikeA: Now if you'd just remember our wedding anniversary...$2
Entries.birthdayDislikeB: It's official, Demetrius is a better gift giver than you. *sigh*$2
Entries.birthdayNeutralB: Hey, you remembered! Thanks for the gift, @.

Entries.birthdayLoveB: We can eat this together, if you want, @.$6#$b#I'm so happy to have a {{SpouseNoun}} that knows me so well.$9

Entries.robinKitchenLetter: Dear Farmer @,^^You might need some more space someday! That's where I can help. If you bring me some raw materials and pay a fee, I can expand your house. The first expansion I offer includes a kitchen. With a kitchen, you'll be able to cook any recipes you've learned!^^Anyway, I hope you're starting to feel at home in Stardew Valley!^^   Your local carpenter,^   Veronica

Entries.election: Joja Co. has a history of treating the environment poorly. And now Morris is our Mayor...$2#$e#Robin and Veronica are worried their carpentry trade will be replaced with a cheaper alternative...$2

One of the best things about coming out here was escaping the city.$2#$e#With the changes that will be coming to our town soon, it goes to show that we need to appreciate the good things in ours lives while we have them.$4
If I wanted roads developed outside the home I built, I would've done it myself...$3#$e#I'm afraid Morris will try running my carpentry trade out of business...$2

Entries.1000015/m 60000/w sunny/z winter/z fall/: springtown/-500 -500/farmer 19 39 0 Demetrius 27 29 0 Jodi 21 24 1 Caroline 23 24 3 Penny 47 33 2/skippable/showFrame Penny 18/pause 600/viewport 26 29 true/pause 250/textAboveHead Demetrius "The fountain is stunning today."/move farmer 0 -10 1/move farmer 1 0 1/emote farmer 8/pause 800/move Demetrius 0 0 3/pause 300/textAboveHead Demetrius "Hello!"/pause 1000/move farmer 5 0 1/pause 300/speak Demetrius "Hi, @!$1#$b#The weather is astonishing, wouldn't you say?$0"/pause 800/move Demetrius 0 0 0/pause 1200/speak Demetrius "Did you know this fountain is thirty years old?$0#$b#It's maintained and repaired by a technician from Grampleton.$1"/pause 500/move Demetrius 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Demetrius "Are you making progress cultivating your farm?$1#$b#I haven't visited it since you allowed me to set up my experiment in the cave, which I'm still thankful for!$0"/pause 200/speak Demetrius "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 demetrius_event1#Veronica constructed buildings on my farm!#$r -1 0 demetrius_event2#I'm looking into crafting sprinklers to automate watering.#$r -1 0 demetrius_event3#I've been focusing on honing my combat skills and fishing."/pause 1100/speak Demetrius "Glad you're doing fine here in Stardew Valley. Owning a farm is a lot of work and may be overwhelming at times.$0"/pause 800/speak Demetrius "Speaking of Stardew Valley...$0"/pause 200/speak Demetrius "$q -1 null#Do you know where our valley gets its name?#$r -1 0 demetrius_event4#Does our valley get its name from space stuff?#$r -1 0 demetrius_event5#Because star... dew? Something? I don't know.#$r -1 0 demetrius_event6#Where does the name come from?"/pause 800/speak Demetrius "A thousand years ago, a huge meteor shower periodically bombarded this specific area of the Ferngill Republic.$0#$b#Of course, back then, the Republic didn't exist yet.$3#$b#The meteors were so plentiful that their trails looked like fibers stretched across the sky.$0#$b#The meteorites looked like tiny drops on the trails, like morning dew on a spiderweb. So our ancestors called these showers the 'Silk Dew of The Stars'.$0#$b#When the Ferngill Republic was first established 150 years ago, the Admission Union named this valley 'Stardew' in honor of our ancestors.$0#$b#Have you ever wondered why your crops are always healthy? Or why they so easily bear high-quality produce?$0#$b#That's because of the meteor shower! The soil in the valley is extremely fertile. It has an abundance of nutrients such as nitrogen, phosphorus and potassium!$1#$b#There's also a high concentration of minerals present in the soil, including zinc, manganese, boron, iron, sulfur, cobalt, copper, magnesium and so on.$0#$b#You can grow just about anything with ease thanks to the fertile soil. It's the reason so many farmers have established their livelihood in Stardew Valley!$1"/pause 100/emote Demetrius 32/pause 100/question fork0 "#I learned something new! Thanks!#You talk way too much."/fork 1000015_InformativeConversation/stopMusic/pause 500/emote Demetrius 28/pause 1000/speak Demetrius "I apologize, @. It wasn't my intention to ramble like that...$2#$b#I get excited when presented the opportunity to teach someone new things.$2"/pause 700/emote Demetrius 28/pause 1000/speak Demetrius "Well... it's always a pleasure talking to you, @.$2"/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Demetrius -375/end dialogue Demetrius "I'm sorry I took up so much of your day at the fountain, @. That won't happen again.$2#$e#%Demetrius looks sad."
